entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
